timeline.message: Add catalan and correct i18n test
Add catalan and correct i18n test

timeline.bodyText:
Reading files and folders like this is bad practice since it will produce different results depending on the working directory of the test runner, which can be different in the IDE, Gradle, CI and even run configurations.
The safest way is always to operate on the class path (even though that's not as easy)
timeline.author: micheljung

replies.bodyText: I read gradle automatically sets working directory for tests
replies.author: 1-alex98

replies.bodyText: So i do the getResource thing?
